channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2023061679
item.description:
Report X-2023061679

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-25
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND NOTIFIED THE MANAGER THE MANAGER THEN NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: ALL FOUR BOTTLES WERE LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023070116
item.description:
Report X-2023070116

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered and called out by a manager. QA Picked up the package and cleaned the spill. DescribePack: The liquid leaked through a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the spill was cleaned with absorb all and the leaking package was placed in a tote with a liner.

item.title: Report X-2023061628
item.description:
Report X-2023061628

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While a package handler was unloading a trailer, he noticed that a package was on its side and was wet leaking. DescribePack: The pail got loose cap and spilled out about 2 pound staining the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the manager called QA and QA went to the area with a red tote line with a hazmat bag and clean the area and brought the package to the processing cage.

item.title: Report E-2023070069
item.description:
Report E-2023070069

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-09
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that two of the metal 5 gallon cans of hardener (UN3082) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 10 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023061280
item.description:
Report X-2023061280

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: OLATHE
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to this package on a PD van where it was found leaking. QA processed it and put it in a sealed salvage drum. DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA processed it and put it in a sealed salvage drum.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE AND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: BOTH BOTTLES WERE LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAPS AND SOILED THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA NOTICED THE PACKAGE ON THE QA PALLET LEAKING. THE SPILL WAS CLEANED UP AND THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED. DescribePack: ALL FOUR OF THE BOTTLES WERE LEAKING FROM AROUND THE CAPS AND SOILED THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.
